GSP29vytrkt1u:9511: tasyaikatvaṃ tu na, tathātvenumānaśabdapramāṇamātroccheda iti bhāvena
GSP29vytrkt1u:9512: sudhoktaṃ vivṛṇvannāha -- kañceti // dharmīti // parvatādimātraṃ vahnyādimātramityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9514: sa ca eka eveti // rūpī ghaṭa
GSP29vytrkt1u:9524: eva sukhasyātmāntare siddhatvātsvasambandha eva kṛtisādhya iti vaktavyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9528: viśakalitānāmiti // na ca viśiṣṭaṃ nānyatra siddhamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9529: viśiṣṭasya tvanmate padārthāntaratvābhāvādghaṭostītyādivākyabodhyasya ghaṭatatsattayoḥ samavāyasyaikatvenātra tasya jñānatatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9534: 1 ata eva sudhāyāṃ samavāyaikatvanirāsa 2 prakaraṇāvasāne āgamāpahnavaśca samavāyaikye syātpadārthānāṃ tatsaṃsargāṇāṃ 3
GSP29vytrkt1u:9536_1: cottarārdhasyopetya samavāyasyaikatve bādhakāntaraṃ cāha -- evamiti // sveti // svasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:9537: 1.tataḥ 'iti bhāvaḥ' ityevāsti 'ata eve' tyādi nāsti -i. 2.prapadaṃ nāsti
GSP29vytrkt1u:9540: evaṃ duḥkhāsyā 1 tmāntare satvena nivartayitumaśakyatvātsvasambandha eva nivartya iti vācyam
GSP29vytrkt1u:9545: sukhādau duḥkhā 3 disamavāyasya ca, satvena sarvapadārtheṣu sarvadharmasambandhasya sāmyāt sarvasaṅkararūpāvyavasthāsyāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9546: nanvātmādau rūpādisamavāyasya satvepi ghaṭādāviva rūpādinā saha viśeṣaṇatāvaśeṣābhāvādvā ---
GSP29vytrkt1u:9548: 4 siddhasyaiva nityasyaiva duḥkhādisambandhasyāvasānamityapi dhyeyamiti -- evaṃ duḥkhasyeti
GSP29vytrkt1u:9550: samavāyaika 5 tvadūṣaṇaṃ sūtrārūḍhaṃ darśayituṃ sāmyādānavasthiteriti sūtrāṃśasyārthāntaramupetyātiprasaṅgāntaramāha -- api cātmeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9554: yattu maṇau”nanu samavāyasyaikatve kathaṃ rūpinirūpivyavasthe”tyādinaitadena sāṃkaryamāśaṅkyādhikaraṇasvābhāvādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:9560: adhikaraṇasvabhāvādvā ādheyasvabhāvā 1 dvā na śaṅkara iti cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9561: evaṃ hi taireva sarvavyavasthopapattau kiṃ vyavasthityahetunā samavāyena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9562: kiñcaiva sarveṣāmapi vastūnāṃ sarvaiḥ saha eka eva sambandha iti vā 2
GSP29vytrkt1u:9563: kasyāpi kenāpi saha na sambandha iti vā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9564: ādye ādhārasya vā ādheyasya vā sambandhasya vā svabhāvāt kutra cidasambandhavyavahāra ita dvitīye ādhārasya vā ādheyasya vā svabhāvātkutracitsambandhavyavahāra iti ca suvacatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9568: pākena śyāmarūpamiva tatsambandhopi nāṣṭaḥ, raktarūpamiva tatsambandhopyutpanna ityanubhāvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:9569_0: pakṣadvayepyupapattiprakāraṃ paroktanyāyenāha -- ādya ityādinā // nanu saṃyogasyaikye
GSP29vytrkt1u:9569_1: ghaṭasaṃyogo naṣṭaḥ paṭasaṃyoga uptanna iti dhīḥ kathamityata āha -- nāśādīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9573: na hi sambandhanāśepi sambandhinaḥ sthitivat sambandhināśepi sambandhasthitiḥ kṛtracidṛṣṭā
GSP29vytrkt1u:9574: etenātmādiniṣṭhe samavāye rūpādipratisambandhikatvasyābhāvānna saṅkara iti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9577: etenaiva samavāyasya svābhāvataḥ ekatvepi aupādhiko bhedosti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9579: evaṃ hi rūpādiḥ saṃyogātiścaika eva bhedastvaupādhika iti syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9580: ayamanubhavo bhramostvityato bādhakābhāvāditi bhāvenāha -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9586: saṃyogādiri tyādipadena vibhāgasya vā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvādisambandhasya vā grahaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9588: upādhiśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthājjanyagamyārthe 1 śaiṣikeṭhaki kṛte aupādhikaśabdo 2 niṣpannaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9589: aupādhikamityupādhigamyamutopādhijanyamiti kalpadvayalābhaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā ādyepi jñānaṃ pramā bhramo veti bhāvena krameṇa nirāha --
GSP29vytrkt1u:9602: etena lāghavatarkasahakṛtena dharmigrāhakānumānena samavāyasyaikatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca siddhamitinirastam
GSP29vytrkt1u:9605: kathamānantyamityata uktam -- itasta iti // atra tatretyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9626: dvyaṇukādīnāṃ sopādānakatvasādhane kāryatvahetunāpi tatsahakṛtena nityamekaṃ upādānaṃ sidhyet
GSP29vytrkt1u:9635: nanvevamīśvarānumānepi lāghavatarkeṇa kartraikyasiddhirna syādityata āha -- īśvareti // uktamīśvarānumānabhaṅga ityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9636: samavāyābhāve mānābhāvedeva samavāyasiddhirastvityata āha -- samavāyābhāve tviti // ityādyanumānāni
GSP29vytrkt1u:9640: samavāyābhāve tu ayutasiddha 3 yorādhārādheyabhāvanimittakasambandhaḥ na sambandhabhinnaḥ ayutasiddhayorevānyonyaṃ sambandhatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9642: ayutasiddhau yau bhāvau avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātivyaktī viśeṣanityadravye cetyevaṃ dvandvībhūtau dvaudvau padārthau tayorityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9643: atra sambandha ityasyaiva pakṣatve svarūpasambandhena siddhasādhanaṃ atonyonyamityantam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9646_1: tena siddhasādhanavāraṇāya vā avayavāvayavinoḥ pratyekamanyena saṃyoge bādhanirāsāya
GSP29vytrkt1u:9652: ata evāvayavāyavinoḥ pratyekamanyena saha saṃyoge vyibhicāravāraṇāyānyonyamityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9658: abhāvavyāvṛttamanyadena kiñcidayukasiddhatvamiti vādinaṃ prati prayogāntaramāha -- saṃyegeti
GSP29vytrkt1u:9661: saṃyogabhinnaḥ sākṣātsambandhaḥ na saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatobhayabhinnaḥ sākṣātsambandhatvāt saṃyogavat, sakṣātsambandhatvaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatānyānyatvavyāpyam sākṣātsambandhamātravṛttitvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:9663: sambandha ityevoktau raktaḥ sphaṭikaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vastramityādau sphaṭikavastrasaṃyuktajapākusumakardamasambandharaktimakālimādisambandhe bādhavāraṇāya sākṣādityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9677: tathā ca saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatārūpau dvāveva sakṣātsambandhau sidhyato na tvatiriktaḥ kaścitsamavāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9691: yaccocyate -- samavāyasambandhena pūrvaṃ gatvādi jātiviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ anantaraṃ jātiviśiṣṭagakāraviṣayakaṃ savikalpakamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9696: vagāhitvānavagāhitvābhyupagamenaiva 4 dvaividhyasya vācyatvādityataḥ dravyādivikalpānāṃ prathamamevotpattau bādhakābhāvena
GSP29vytrkt1u:9700: vastugatyā samavāyasambandhena sthitā yā gatvādijātiḥ tadviṣayamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9704: nanu yadyapi nirvikalpake na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9713_1: vaiśiṣṭyāviṣakaṃ jñānanirvikalpakaṃ, tenaiva sannikarṣeṇa paścājjāyamānaṃ jātiviśiṣṭajñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9721: nāpi jāgarādyaṃ gauriti jñānaṃ janyaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ janyaviśiṣṭajñānatvāt daṇḍī puruṣa iti jñānavadityanumānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9723: daṇḍapuruṣayo 1 rubhayoryugapadindriyasannikarṣe asaṃsargāgrahe ca sati vinaiva daṇḍajñānaṃ daṇḍīti jñānotpādānubhavāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9730_0: atiprasaṅgācceti // jñānatvaṃ ghaṭatvasamānādhikaraṇamiti, tathā cakṣuḥ cākṣuṣanirvikalpakasavikalpakātiriktaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9749: anyathā janmāntarānubhūtānāṃ etajjanmani indriyasannikṛṣṭānāṃ nityānāṃ vaidikānāṃ cārthānāṃ smṛtireva syānna tvanubhavaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9763: kaheturastvityāśaṅkyāha -- na ca gotvarūpeti // pūrvapakṣadaśāyāṃ maṇyuktamevānukūlatarkamatrāha -- anumitīti // ādipadadvayena kramādupamitivācakajñānayorgrahaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9768: evaṃ ca yadviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ asati bādhake tatsāmānyayorapi sa iti nyāyena sādhyaprasiddhyāderjanyaviśiṣṭajñānasāmānye janyaviśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutvasiddhiriti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9775: pṛthivīmātrayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ syādityata āha-- asatibādhaka iti // tatra vyabhicārasyaiva bādhakatvādiha ca tadabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9776: sādhyaprasiddhyāderahetutveneti // 4 tadahetutvaṃ ca dvitīyatṛtīyaparicchedayorvivarīṣyata iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9778: ityanuvyākhyānoktaṃ hṛdikṛtvāha -- na hīti // ādipadena śabdajñānasaṃketasmaraṇayoḥ satve iti grahaḥ // tadvilambena sādhyaprasiddhipadārthasmṛtivivambenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9783: na ca vyāptyādidhīre tena vinā neti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9786: tathāpa vahnimānityādijñānaṃ prati vahnyādijñānasya na viśeṣaṇajñānatvenaiva kāraṇatā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9796_0: paraprakriyāmupetyāpi nirvikalpakāsiddhimāha -- astu veti // astvevaṃ ko doṣa ityata
GSP29vytrkt1u:9796_1: āha -- tathā ca na nirvikalpaketi // tasya niṣprakārakatvena yadviśeṣanyāyenāpi viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakāraṇajñānasyaiva
GSP29vytrkt1u:9798: evamapi nirvikalpakasiddhiriti bhāvena maṇyuktamāśaṅkyate -- nanu tatreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9807: hetutvādyadviśeṣayoriti nyāyena janyajñānamātre karaṇamātrajñānaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9810: api caivaṃ pratyakṣaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ prati viśeṣyajñānasyāpi hetunā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9811: saṃśayādau dharmyādi jñānasyānumityadau pakṣādijñānasya hetutvena kḷptatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9812: tatra vahnitvaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyasya parvate bhānādgorityādi 4 tu viśiṣṭajñānamātramityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9815: atiprasaṅgāntaroktyā yadviśeṣayoritinyāyasyābhāsatāmāha - 6 api caivamiti // yadviśeṣayoriti nyāyena viśiṣṭajñānamātraṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9817: saṃśayarūpaviśiṣṭapratyakṣaviśeṣaṃ prati, tathā idaṃ rajatamityādiviparītaviśiṣṭapratyakṣaviśeṣaṃ prati ca
GSP29vytrkt1u:9820: tathā anumitau pakṣajñānasya śābde 7 bodhe ca padārthajñānasya ca hetutvamasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9826: na ca iṣṭāpattiḥ daṇḍatvaviṣayake nirvikalpake sāmagrīsatvena daṇḍasyāpi svarūpeṇa bhānāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9828: kiṃ ca sāmānyapratyāsattirneti pakṣe vyāptigrahakāle anubhūto vahniḥ parvataṃ prati na viśeṣaṇam
GSP29vytrkt1u:9832: viśeṣaṇajñāna 2 syeva viśeṣaṇajñānatvena daṇḍatvaviśiṣṭasavikalpake daṇḍarūpaviśeṣyajñānasya hetutvaṃ nāniṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9833: viśeṣyajñānatveneti // viśeṣaṇajñānasya satvena yathā hetutvaṃ tatheti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9834: yadviśeṣanyāyenāpi na viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutvaṃ kalpiyituṃ śakyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9836: sattirastīti nyāyamate 4 yo dhūmavānasau vahnimāniti vyāptigrahadaśāyāṃ parvatīyavahnerapi parvataviśeṣaṇatayā bhānenoktadoṣāsaṃbhāvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9842: api ca tvayāpi ghaṭābhāvavadbhūtalamiti jñāne abhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇasya saṃyoktāvimau samavetāvimāvityādijñāne ca saṃyogasamavāyādirūpasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:9844: viśeṣaṇasya, abhāvajñāne pratiyogitvā 2 dirūpasya viśeṣaṇasya ca, pūrvamajñātasyaiva bhānamiti svīkṛtatvāttatra vyabhicāraḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9845: bhūtale abhāva ityabhāvādiviśeṣyakajñānānantarameva bhūtalamabhāvavadityabhāva 3 viśeṣaṇakajñānamiti kalpena tvanyonyāśrayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9847: etenānugasya viśeṣaṇajñānasyāhetutve anugataṃ viśiṣṭajñānarūpaṃ kāryamākasmikaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9850: yadbalādviśeṣaṇajñānahetutāsiddhyā nirvikalpakasiddhiriti bhāvenānekasthaleṣu vyabhicāramāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9851_0: yattu maṇāvetadevāśaṅkya prathamaṃ bhūtale ghaṭonāstīti buddhirityādinā samādhānamuktaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9851_1: tadanūdya nirāha -- bhūtalebhāva ityādinā // anyonyāśraya ityuktaṃ vyanaktiḥ -- etaditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9853: viśiṣṭajñānaviśeṣaṇajñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve siddhe hi vyabhicārasya gatyantarakalpanaṃ siddhe ca tasya gatyantare tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt1u:9859: tadā jñānasāmānyasāmagrīta eva viśiṣṭajñānotpattau sarvamapi jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ syāditi bhayena viśeṣasāmagrī kalpyeta /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9863: vyabhicārasyoktatvāditi // tathā cānugatakāraṇābhāvādviśiṣṭajñānatvaṃ kāryatāvacchedakameva neti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9866: anyathā tadapi viśiṣṭajñānamāpadyetetyata āha // yadi hīti // viśeṣeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9869: nanu nirvakalpakasyātīndriyatvādeva nānubhava ityata āha -- anyatheti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9872: anyathā niṣprakārakadhīvannirviṣayāpi dhīḥ syāt/ icchāpi kācinniṣprakārikātīndriyā ca syāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:9874: etenaiva vyabhicāreṇa rūpyādismṛterbhrame viśeṣaṇajñānatvena kāraṇatvaṃ kḷptamatonyatrāpi viśiṣṭajñāne tatkaraṇamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9876: bhramaṃ prati viśeṣyajñānasyāpihetutāyāḥ kḷptatvena anyatrāpi viśiṣṭajñāne tasyāpi hetutvāpatteśca
GSP29vytrkt1u:9877: nanu -- viśeṣañjñānasyājanakatve kathaṃ viśeṣaṇasyaiva prakāratvamiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9891: nanviti // sannikarṣo niyāmaka ityata āha -- sannikarṣasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9896: kiṃ ca phalībhūtajñāne yadviśeṣaṇajñāne yadviśeṣaṇatvena bhāsate tadviṣayakajñānena janyaṃ yajjñānaṃ 1 tattatprakārakamiti vā niyamaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:9906: tvaduktarītyā bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāva ityabhāvaviśeṣyakajñānasya prāthamikatveṣyabhāvatvasya tatrājñātatasyaiva prakāratvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9907: bhāvasthala evāyaṃ niyama ityuktāvapīmau saṃyuktau ityādāvabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9908_0: nanu tarhi gotvāderiva prakāratvaniyamo kiṃ bījamityatastatparamukhenaiva vācayituṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9908_1: paroktaṃ viśiṣṭadhīhetudhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ prakāratvaṃ vikalpya nirāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9910: ātmāśrayāditi // viśeṣaṇatvenetyasya prakāratvenetyarthatayā prakaratvajñāne prakāratvajñānasyāpekṣitatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9914: uktena 1 vyabhicāreṇaiva viśiṣṭajñānaṃ sambandhaviṣayakaṃ sambandhajñāne ca sambandhijñānaṃ hetuḥ sambandhi ca viśeṣaṇamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9915: sambandhinoryugapadindriyasannikarṣe tayorasaṃsargāgrahe ca tābhyāṃ sahaivendriyasannikṛṣṭasambandhasyāpi dhīrityuktatvācca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9916: iyāṃstu bhedaḥ ; sambandhaḥ sambandhinau vinā na bhāti tau tu tena vināpi
GSP29vytrkt1u:9917: bhāta iti // kiñca viśeṣyasyāpi sambandhitvena tajjñānasyāpi hetutā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9918: na ca viśeṣyasya sambandhitvepi na 2 pratiyogitvaṃ kiṃ tu viśeṣaṇasyaiveti tajjñānameva heturiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9920: abhāvavadbhītalamityādau sambandhino 'bhāvāderajñānepi viśiṣṭajñānodayena na tasya hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9921: doṣāntaraṃ cāha -- sambandhinoriti // uktatvācceti // tvanmate viśeṣypītyādinā granthenoktaprāyatvādityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9924: iyāṃstviti // ayaṃ bhadau vastusvabhāva kṛta iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9925: viśeṣaṇasya pratiyogitvāttannimittaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānasya viśiṣṭajñānahetutvaṃ cettadā doṣamāha -- abhāvādibuddhāviveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9933: na ca tatrāpi pūrvānubhavo viśeṣaṇajñānatayā saṃskāradvārā heturiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9935: yajjātīyasya yaṃ 3 janayitveva yajjanātīyajanakatvaṃ sa eva hi tatra 4 vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9940: cakṣurādīndriyajātīyasya sannikarṣaṃ janayatvaiva cākṣuṣādisākṣātkārajātīyajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti sannikarṣa evendriyasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9941: tathā daṇḍajātīyasya cakrabhramaṃ janayitvaiva ghaṭajātīyajanakatvamiti bhramiḥ daṇḍasya vyāpāro dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9944: nanvastvevaṃ vyāpāratvaṃ tādṛśamapi saṃskārasyāstvityata āha -- na cātreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9947: nanu viśiṣṭajñānasyoktavidhayā kāryatāvacchedakatvepi nirvikalpakāsiddhiḥ kuta ityata āha -- tathāceti // janyaviśiṣṭajñānatvasyānavacchedakatve satītyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9951: nanu smaraṇasya viśeṣaṇajñāna 1 janyatvādanavasthetyata āha -- janyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9953: smṛtivyāvṛttameva kāryatāvacchedakaṃ svayamupapādya smṛtisādhāraṇameva kāryatāvaccedakamastviti matāntaramāha -- keci 3 diti // ityāhurityanvayaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9960: prathamapravṛttena pramāṇena lāghavasahakāriṇā janyajñānaparamparāyāmeva viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9962: na ca janyasya sarvasyāpi jñānasya viśeṣaṇajñānyatve pūrvapūrvajñānadhārāyā avicchede prāyaṇādyanupapatyā jñānānavasthādoṣaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9966: pūrvajanmāntararīyānubhava iti svīkāre 4 ṇāviralalagrajñānadhārāyā abhāvena prāyaṇādyupapatteḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:9967: na ca puruṣa 5 prayojyaśabdavṛttijātiviśiṣṭapratyakṣe viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ na
GSP29vytrkt1u:9988: nirvikalpeke sādhakābhāvamātraṃ na bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9993: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva nirvikalpakābhāve liṅgam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9994: nirvikalpake sati savikalpakāvaśyaṃbhāvābhāvena nirvikalpakaṃ prati savikalpakasyā vyāpakatvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:9997_1: parāmarśena gṛhyamāṇo ghaṭādyabhāvotra ghaṭo nāsti yogyatve satyanupalabhyamānatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt1u:9999: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva ghaṭādyabhāvabuddhau liṅgamastu savikalpakasya yogyatayā tadabhāvajñānasaṃbhavāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10002_1: ca prataykṣādityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti // savikalpakāvaśyaṃbhāvāveneti // nirvikalpakamātraṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10004_0: bādhakāntaramāha -- api ceti // savikalpakadaśāyāṃ nirvikalpakasāmagryeva nāsti nirvikalpakābhāvasahakṛtendriyasaṃyogādereva
GSP29vytrkt1u:10004_1: nirvikalpakasāmagrītvādevaṃ ca noktadoṣa iti bhāvenāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca pūrveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10005: 1.itaḥ ' na ca pūrva' ityantaṃ nāsti. atra 'mapi indriya sannikarṣarūpa'
GSP29vytrkt1u:10010: na ca samūhālambana 1 vat sāmagryā 2 dārthasamājādekaṃ jñānamastīti vācyam
GSP29vytrkt1u:10012: na hi saṃbhavatyevameva jñānamekasminneva ghaṭe ghaṭatvaprakārakaṃ tada 3 prakārakaṃ ceti
GSP29vytrkt1u:10013: api ca daṇḍapuru 4 ṣobhayasannikarṣe sati daṇḍadaṇḍatvobhayanirvikalpakānantaraṃ daṇḍe
GSP29vytrkt1u:10016: tattandriyasannikarṣarūpānekasāmagrīsatvepi anekagocaramekaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate na tu pratibandha evamastvityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10018: nanu smṛtisāmagrītonubhavasāmagryā ivānumitisāmagrītaḥ pratyakṣasamāmagryā iva ca nirvikalpakasyaivotpattirityastvityato doṣāntaramāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10027: na hi daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭapuruṣajñānamanubhūyate
GSP29vytrkt1u:10031: kiñca daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣe 1 tadubhayasvarūpamātraviṣayakanirvikalpakavat sambandhasyāpi sannikarṣe 2 tatsvarūpamātraviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakamapi kasmānna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt1u:10048: api cāsya nirvikalpakajatīyasya jñānakāryaṃ vyāvahāraṃ saṃskāraṃ icchādikaṃ ca kadāpyajanayato na jñānatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10049: natarāṃ cāsya svaṣaye kadāpi saṃśayādyavirodhino niścayatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10050: natamāṃ cāsya svaviṣayasiddhimakurvataḥ pramātvam/ na ca nirvikalpakena kasyacidapi vastutaḥ kadāpi siddhirdṛṣṭā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10052: api caivaṃ nirvikalpakajñānaṃ pratyakṣaviśeṣavat anumitiviśeṣopi syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10053_0: abhyupetya vā doṣāntaramāha -- api cāsyeti // kvacitkāryājananepi nirvikalpakāntare
GSP29vytrkt1u:10054_0: siddhimakurvata ityetavdyanakti -- na ceti // nanvīśvarajñānamiva nirvikalpakamapi
GSP29vytrkt1u:10054_1: pramābhramavijātīyajñānamanitya 2 mityata āha -- na ceti // tathātve ghaṭādirapi
GSP29vytrkt1u:10055: yadapi”pratyakṣaṃ dvividhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ savikalpakaṃ ce”ti maṇyādau pratyakṣa 3 tvakathanaṃ tadapyayuktamityāha -- api caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10059: nirvikalpakābhāve tu jñānatvāśrayo na savikalpakatvāvacchinnibhinnaḥ jñānatvāt daṇḍīti jñānavat, savikalpakatvaṃ 1 jñānaniṣṭhātyantābhāvā 2
GSP29vytrkt1u:10062: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ paddhatau”dravyādivikalpānāṃ prathamamevotpattau bādhakābhāvena 4 nirvikalpakā 5 nupapatteḥ”iti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10063: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ ca nirvikalpakamiti bhāvenāha -- nirvikalpakābhāve tviti // ityādidraṣṭavyamityuttareṇānvayaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10065: savikalpakasyāpi savikalpakāntarabhinnatvādbādhanirāsāya savikalpakatvāvacchinnabhinneti sādhyoktiḥ /yatkiñcitsavikalpakatve 6 vyabhicāranirāsāya sakaleti
GSP29vytrkt1u:10072: yadviśeṣayorityādinyāyarūpasyā 1 nugakāraṇaṃ vinānugatakāryānutpattirūpasya viśeṣaṇasya pūrvamabhāne viśiṣṭajñāne prakāratvānupapattirūpasya sambandhijñānaṃ vinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:10091: iti śrīmadbrahmaṇyatīrtha pūjyapādānāṃ śiṣyeṇa vyāsayatinā viracite tarkatāṇḍave prathamaḥ
